Package game

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
game.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Class which stores information about items in player's inventory

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item item, int numberOfItems)
      Add an item to the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - Accepts the item to add to inventory as an Item object.
      numberOfItems - Accepts the quantity of items to add to inventory as an integer.

    • formatDisplay

      public String formatDisplay()
      Formats the players inventory.
      Returns:
      The players inventory formatted as a string.

    • getItems

      public HashMap<Item,​Integer> getItems()
      Accessor method to getting the items a player has in inventory.
      Returns:
      The items in inventory, along with the quantity of items, as a hashmap.

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem​(Item item)
      Determine if a player has a specific item in inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to check for in inventory.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player has an of the item in inventory.

    • getRemainingInventoryCapacity

      public int getRemainingInventoryCapacity()
      Determine how much inventory capacity is remaining
      Returns:
      The remaining inventory capacity as an integer.

    • pickupItem

      Pick up an item
      Parameters:
      itemToPickup - Accepts the item to pick up as an Item object.
      quantityToPickup - Accepts the quantity of the item to pick up as an integer.

    • setInventory

      public void setInventory​(HashMap<Item,​Integer> items)
      Mutator method to set the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      items - Accepts the items to set as the players inventory as an array list of Item objects.

    • useItem

      public void useItem​(Item itemToUse, PlayerCharacter player)
      Return a string representation of the players inventory.
      Parameters:
      itemToUse - Accepts the item to use as an ItemType object.
